name: Shooter Sky War - Supper Squadron Air
name_original: Shooter Sky War - Supper Squadron Air
description:
Shooter Sky War - Supper Squadron Air
Smash down the enemy planes and gain high scores in your journey of traversing the interstellar!
Just enjoy the super fun of this top sci-fi air battle game with its flowing control, splendid special effects, powerful BGM, delicate aircrafts and challenging levels!
LIVE FREE! PLAY FERE! You can play with no wifi!it can be no wifi,no problem!
- let’s play game together!
-Super amazing aircrafts
-Upgrade the aircrafts to strengthen their attack and defense power
-Beyond the classic arcade mode, it’s more suitable for touch operation
-Unique survival mode! Just enjoy the super fun and get high NOW!!!
